definitions.definition: Apparently only in grit one's teeth : to clench , particularly in reaction to pain or anger.
examples: We had no choice but to grit our teeth and get on with it.
He has a sleeping disorder and grits his teeth.

definitions.definition: To give forth a grating sound, like sand under the feet; to grate ; to grind .

main_definition: Apparently only in grit one's teeth : to clench , particularly in reaction to pain or anger.
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete , intransitive ) To give forth a grating sound, like sand under the feet; to grate ; to grind .
